results.title: Six New England Patriots Say They Will Skip a White House Visit

results.byline: By KELLY WHITESIDE, ANDREW DAS and SARAH LYALL

results.title: A Different Super Bowl Matchup: Politics vs. the N.F.L.

results.title: Goalie Eats Pie and Loses His Job, While Bettors’ Wallets Fatten

results.abstract: The backup goalkeeper for Sutton, Wayne Shaw, said he knew about a bet on whether he’d have a pie during the match and had eaten because of it.

results.title: Patriots Mount a Comeback for the Ages to Win a Fifth Super Bowl

results.title: ‘World’s Worst Skier’ Has Best Explanation: He Never Trained on Snow

results.abstract: Until his debut this week, at the Nordic world ski championships in Finland, Adrian Solano had trained on wheels in South America.

results.title: Lou Gehrig’s Fixer-Upper Awaits a Buyer for the Long Run

media.caption: The back of the house at 9 Meadow Lane in New Rochelle, N.Y., which Lou Gehrig bought in 1927 as a Christmas present for his mother.
